thread.title: Notable & Quotable: Polling Predictions

author: wsjcom
title: Notable & Quotable: Polling Predictions
text:
From a March 16 Boston Globe summary of a study published in Nature Human Behaviour:
According to an analysis of polling data for both the US and French presidential elections, asking respondents how their acquaintances would vote was generally more effective at predicting the outcome than asking respondents about their own voting intentions....
